data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Ramanathapuram, Tamil Nadu, India.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Ramanathapuram, Tamil Nadu, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Ramanathapuram with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.section_summary: On average, 110 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Ramanathapuram, Tamil Nadu, India.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 14,887 believers in Ramanathapuram, Tamil Nadu, India a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Ramanathapuram who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Mukkari people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 1,322,091 who are far from you in Ramanathapuram, Tamil Nadu, India from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Ramanathapuram, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 1,353,400 people living in the county of Ramanathapuram.

location.name: Ramanathapuram
location.people_groups_list: Karumpuram, Mukkuvan (Muslim traditions), Ambalavasi Tottiyan Naicker, Ambattan, Vakkaliga Gangadikara
